public class Allosaur
extends Dinosaur
A children class that inherited from Dinosaur class, which is a carnivore dinosaur.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Allosaur()  
    Allosaur​(int hitPoints)
    Constructor of Allosaur class All Allosaurs are represented by an 'a' and have 100 hit points, hungry threshold of 90, breed threshold of 50 and dead threshold of 20.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      This method ticks all the allosaurs across the gamemap.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      action to be performed.
      See Also:
      Actor.playTurn(Actions, Action, GameMap, Display)

    • getEatAction

      public DinosaurAction getEatAction​(Location location)
      This method is to create a new eat action when the food in the location is eatable for allosaur.
      Specified by:
      getEatAction in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      location - of the allosaur
      Returns:
      a new EatAction(foodList) if condition is met, null if location not valid or food is not eatable.

    • canEat

      public boolean canEat​(Eatable food)
      This method is to check whether the food is eatable for allosaur. In this case, only egg, corpse and mealkit are eatable.
      Specified by:
      canEat in class Dinosaur
      Parameters:
      food - to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean depends on whether the food is eatable

      Returns:
